custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SocialActivitySet.activitySetId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM Sharing_SharingEntry INNER JOIN SocialActivitySet ON (SocialActivitySet.classNameId = Sharing_SharingEntry.classNameId) AND (SocialActivitySet.classPK = Sharing_SharingEntry.classPK) LEFT JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivitySet.userId) WHERE ([$CLASS_NAME_IDS_CLASS_PKS])

SELECT DISTINCT Sharing_SharingEntry.classNameId as classNameId, Sharing_sharingEntry.classPK as classPK FROM Sharing_SharingEntry INNER JOIN SocialActivitySet ON (SocialActivitySet.classNameId = Sharing_SharingEntry.classNameId) AND (SocialActivitySet.classPK = Sharing_SharingEntry.classPK) LEFT JOIN SocialRelation ON (SocialRelation.userId2 = SocialActivitySet.userId) WHERE ([$CLASS_NAME_IDS_CLASS_PKS]) ORDER BY SocialActivitySet.modifiedDate DESC
